boardgame.name: HeroQuest
ヒーロークエスト
boardgame.description: HeroQuest is Milton Bradley's approach to a Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons-style adventure game. One player acts as game master, revealing the maze-like dungeon piecemeal as the players wander. Up to four other players take on a character (wizard, elf, dwarf, or barbarian) and venture forth into dungeons on fantasy quests. Plastic miniatures and 3-D furniture make this game very approachable. Expansions were also released for this system._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The HeroQuest series consists of the main game and a number of expansions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game was made in cooperation with Games Workshop who designed the miniatures and helped in many of the production details including background world and art in the rule book and scenario book._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Additional material which is generally missed since it is not technically an expansion was published in the HeroQuest: Adventure Design Kit which did feature one more Heroquest adventure: A Plague of Zombies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Other sources of HeroQuest supplements which are available (in some cases online.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A very good copy of HeroQuest that I only rank good because of the box, which shows some edge wear (no split corners though). The actual contents are in complete, very good condition, with a couple of the empty doorframes very slightly bent and some of the dice a bit worn but no other issues. Otherwise there are plenty of character sheets left, and the cards/furniture are in pristine, mint condition. I even still have the advertising for other HQ expansions and all the other promotional materials that came with the game inside. I played this game maybe five times and it has been stored safely in my basement for the past few years. None of my friends at home nor my current game group is interested in playing this, so I decided to offer it up here. Will ship to both U.S. and Canada, with payment via BidPay ONLY since I cannot take PayPal payments (being a Canadian resident and all). I will charge exact costs for shipping, no overhead, no handling, just what it costs me to get it to you. The game is currently securely packaged and ready to ship and costs are going to be around $12 for basic ground and about $17 for Xpresspost plus insurance. Buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;s choice on that one. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;d just like to see this game find its way to someplace where it will actually get used, so here it is!
